message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more this time.  But I need more than 4000 to cover the inflation, or it's not worth it for me.
Inflation isn't my problem, let's get real
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm taking a big hit from inflation, but I'm willing to make a compromise. Let's end this now.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take what you can get at this point.
I'm not giving you any more, Bob. This is the best I can do with the inflation. If you want to keep going, we'll both get less.
You're running out of options, I'm taking what's left.
